name: Fandom Spotlite
profile:
Fandom Spotlite is all about GEEK CULTURE, with features on conventions, cosplay, comic books, movies, toys, TV shows, movies, anime and more. Plus some comedy as well. Our videos include panels from comic and sci-fi conventions, celebrity interviews, costume and prop reviews, commentary on TV and movies, tips for conventions and cosplay... you get the idea!

We promote acceptance and inclusion in the fandom community. Our shared enjoyment of fandom should bring us together, for we are all much more alike than we are different.
---------------
Check out our website at https://www.fandomspotlite.com
---------------
Support this channel at https://patreon.com/FandomSpotlite
---------------
Follow us on:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FandomSpotlite
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fandomspotlite/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/FandomSpotlite/
---------------
Have fun and follow your fandom.
